mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim Becomes Our Command!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this: I stroll into my Bank of Entitlement branch wearing my designer suit, oozing success. I casually mention to the teller, "I need a loan-but make it quick, darling, I have a yacht party to attend in an hour." And just like that, the whole bank springs into action, bending over backward to make it happen. As I leisurely sip my cappuccino, they present me with the paperwork, signed and sealed, as if by magic. I glance at the interest rate and, in a fit of faux outrage, declare, "Is this a joke? Do you know who I am?" The teller trembles, apologizing profusely and slashing the rate in half without hesitation. I smile smugly, fully satisfied with my power over the Bank of Entitlement. Another day, another conquest for Hot Josh.
